hero.headline: Comfortable Transfers When You Need Them
hero.paragraph: Door-to-door and airport transfers across London and the UK. PCO licensed, professional drivers.

testimonials.quote: On time, clean car, great driver.
testimonials.author: Sarah M.

about.title: Who We Are
about.description: Reliable private hire and transfers across London and the UK.
about.paragraph1: We are a London-based private hire operator with a focus on reliability and comfort. Our team of PCO-licensed drivers and well-maintained vehicles are here to make your journey smooth.
about.paragraph2: Whether you need an airport transfer, a door-to-door ride, or hourly hire, we tailor our service to your schedule. Quality and safety come first.

features.title: PCO licensed
features.text: Fully compliant with TfL Private Hire regulations.

features.title: Fixed quotes
features.text: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees.

items.question: How do I book a transfer?
items.answer: You can book via our website, by phone, or WhatsApp. We will confirm your booking and send you driver details before the journey.

items.question: Do you do airport pickups?
items.answer: Yes. We cover all major London airports including Heathrow, Gatwick, Stansted, Luton and London City.

items.question: Can I get a quote in advance?
items.answer: Yes. Contact us with your pickup and drop-off points and we will provide a fixed quote.

items.question: What if my flight is delayed?
items.answer: We track your flight and adjust pickup time at no extra cost. Keep your phone on so we can reach you.

items.question: Do you provide child seats?
items.answer: Yes. Please request when booking and we will fit an appropriate child seat at no extra charge.

items.question: How do I pay?
items.answer: We accept card payments and cash. Payment details can be confirmed when you book.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Call, message or email — we're here to help.

footerCta.title: Ready to Book?
footerCta.description: Get a fixed quote or book your transfer now. We're available 24/7.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.body: We respect your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal data when you use our services or website. This is placeholder text; replace with your full privacy policy.

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.body: Cancellation and refund terms depend on how far in advance you cancel. Full details will be provided at booking. This is placeholder text; replace with your full refund policy.
